title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain Python adapter that lets any chain or agent use Ollama-hosted models via a one-line LLM constructor.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama REST API—browser & Node.js ready.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API with sync & async support.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama—docker-run in one command, supports multi-model chats & code highlighting.

title: jmorganca/ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI service that exposes additional OpenAI-style endpoints for any Ollama model.

title: ollama-ai/ollama-ai
summary: Community Go SDK for Ollama with automatic model pulling and connection pooling.

title: ollama-rust on crates.io
summary: Idiomatic Rust crate that wraps the Ollama HTTP API with async/await and Serde models.

title: ollama-copilots on GitHub
summary: Collection of IDE extensions (VS Code, JetBrains) that connect GitHub Copilot-like features to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt app that brings local LLM power into company Slack workspaces.

title: ollama-elixir on GitHub
summary: Elixir OTP library that manages Ollama instances and chats via GenServers for fault-tolerant apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module that spins up GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and systemd service.

title: ollama-cli-chat (npm)
summary: Tiny CLI tool that starts an interactive REPL in your terminal using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit component that adds a ChatGPT-like UI to any Streamlit app backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack (PyPI)
summary: Haystack integration that lets pipelines use Ollama models for generative QA and RAG.

title: ollama-rag on GitHub
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles for niche domains (medical, legal, coding).

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, new models, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
